results.description: Somerset appoint Stuart Barnes as a full-time bowling coach on a two-year contract.
results.title: Stuart Barnes given Somerset full-time bowling coach role

results.description: Somerset all-rounder Lewis Gregory signs a one-year contract extension with the county.
results.title: Lewis Gregory: Somerset all-rounder agrees one-year contract extension

results.description: Somerset batsman George Bartlett signs an extended contract until the end of the 2022 season.
results.title: George Bartlett: Somerset batsman signs extended deal until 2022

results.description: Australian batsman Steve Smith could lead cosmopolitan Welsh Fire in first season of the Hundred tournament.
results.shortTitle: Australia star Smith could lead Welsh Fire
results.title: The Hundred: Australia star Steve Smith could captain Welsh Fire

results.description: Australian stars Steve Smith and Mitchell Starc will be part of the Welsh Fire squad for the inaugural Hundred competition in 2020.
results.shortTitle: Welsh Fire pick Smith and Starc
results.title: The Hundred: Welsh Fire pick Steve Smith and Mitchell Starc

results.description: Most of Glamorgan, Somerset and Gloucestershire's players opt in for the Hundred draft but may not end up at the Welsh Fire franchise.
results.shortTitle: Glamorgan players opt in for Hundred
results.title: Welsh Fire: Glamorgan players opt in for Hundred draft

thumbnail.altText: Glamorgan's Colin Ingram is already confirmed as a Welsh Fire player

results.description: Somerset head coach Jason Kerr signs a new contract that will keep him at the club until the end of the 2022 season.
results.shortTitle: Somerset head coach Kerr extends deal
results.title: Jason Kerr: Somerset head coach signs new contract

results.description: Somerset batsman Tom Banton signs to play for Brisbane Heat in Australia's Big Bash League this winter.
results.shortTitle: Somerset's Banton to join Brisbane Heat
results.title: Big Bash League: Tom Banton of Somerset signs for Brisbane Heat

results.description: Teenager Tom Lammonby signs a one-year contract extension with Somerset to keep him at the club until the end of 2021.
results.title: Tom Lammonby: Somerset all-rounder signs contract extension

results.description: Batsman Eddie Byrom signs a new two-year contract with County Championship runners-up Somerset.
results.shortTitle: Batsman Byrom signs new deal at Somerset
results.title: Eddie Byrom: Somerset batsman signs new two-year contract

thumbnail.altText: Eddie Byrom made his Somerset debut in 2017

results.description: Essex spinner Simon Harmer is named County Championship Player of the Year, while Somerset's Tom Banton wins the young cricketer award.
results.shortTitle: Harmer & Banton pick up writers' awards
results.title: Cricket Writers' Club awards: Simon Harmer and Tom Banton pick up accolades

results.description: With the 2019 county cricket season over, keep up to date with the latest signings, departures and rumours for 2020.
results.title: County ins & outs - signings, departures and rumours

thumbnail.altText: Miguel Cummins has ended his West Indies career to join Middlesex as a Kolpak player

results.description: Somerset wicketkeeper-batsman Steve Davies signs a new two-year deal with the County Championship runners-up.
results.title: Steve Davies: Somerset wicketkeeper-batsman signs new two-year deal

results.description: Kent sign seamer Tim Groenewald on a two-year deal from County Championship runners-up Somerset.
results.title: Tim Groenewald: Seamer leaves Somerset to join Kent on two-year deal

thumbnail.altText: Somerset's Tim Groenewald appealing for a wicket

results.description: Marcus Trescothick says he was scared at the prospect of retirement at first but has come to accept it.
results.shortTitle: Trescothick knew 'time was right' to retire
results.title: Marcus Trescothick: Somerset and England opener admits coming to terms with retirement

results.description: Marcus Trescothick's parents, Lin and Martyn, reflect on their son's incredible career for Somerset and England as he retires.
results.shortTitle: Parents look back on Trescothick's career
results.title: Marcus Trescothick's parents look back on Somerset and England cricketer's career

results.description: Somerset captain Tom Abell is confident his side will get their hands on a first County Championship title soon.
results.title: Tom Abell: Somerset captain 'desperate' to claim first County Championship title

results.description: Marcus Trescothick is given a standing ovation as he takes to the field for the final time bringing to an end his 26-year career.
results.shortTitle: 'Take a bow' - Trescothick given standing ovation to end 26-year career
results.title: Marcus Trescothick takes to the field for Somerset for the final time

results.description: Essex are crowned county champions, while Somerset miss out again as the title decider ends in a dramatic draw at Taunton.
results.title: Essex win County Championship: Draw with Somerset confirms 2019 title

thumbnail.altText: Essex opener Alastair Cook with the County Championship trophy
